critique: The document is an executive order amending the Civil Service Rules. As the President, I aim to elicit feelings of joy and trust by ensuring fair and impartial governance. I also want to convey a sense of stability and order through the establishment of clear rules and procedures. The document's tone is formal and authoritative, reflecting the seriousness of the subject matter. The language is precise and legalistic, emphasizing the importance of compliance and adherence to the rules. The context is the need to reform and improve the civil service system, ensuring that it is efficient, effective, and free from political influence.
